title: What mystery gift did I get???
body: I have kayle and riot kayle so I got a mystery gift instead of the latter.  So I got my mystery gift pop up and it tells me absolutely nothing afterwards.  Do i really have to scroll through every single champion and skin to see which one I got?  I already checked my purchase history and 10 year anniversary icon is the last thing on it along with dark star varus which i purchased recently.  Is there any easier way for me to figure out what skin I got?

replies.body: The pop up toast you'll see will likely be for the icon.  Not everything has been distributed yet, so hang tight!  If you get a mystery gift, it may show up in your store's purchase history.  We'll have updates through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hold tight until everything is finished!

Oh, that makes sense.. thank you for being here and explaining that for me.  You get a one up from me sir Porocles!  
Btw this is the first time a rioter has ever responded to me personally so thank you for popping my cherry B)
The core issue here is that users can't see what skins they own. RIOT please help us. Once we've bought a few skins it can be hard to keep track of!

the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received a mystery gift by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket. #totallydidntcopypaste
